Name: Rainbow Players
ExecutionCode:
timer.Create("rainbow_players", 0.1, 0, function()
    for k,v in pairs(player.GetAll()) do
        v:SetColor(Color(math.random(255), math.random(255), math.random(255)))
    end
end)
UndoCode:
timer.Remove("rainbow_players")
for k,v in pairs(player.GetAll()) do
    v:SetColor(Color(255, 255, 255))
end
